name: The Unstable Ranger
description:
A little proof of concept made in class.

Use WASD to move arm parts,
123 to change arm parts,
spacebar to shoot,
and escape to quit.

Made in a 5 man team. Arm movement, unity scene creation, physics, and UI done by myself. Bullet, Arm + gun, hat, shootable objects, and sound done by teammates.

Credits:

Miko Sramek

Eleanor Chan

Sebastian Flores-Armas

Gabrielle Harte

Mario Martinez
